content: finished measurements circumference at top approx 68 86 cm / 26 75 33-7/8 circumference at lower edge approx 184 212 cm / 72-3/8 83 5 length approx 35 38 cm / 13 75 14-7/8 materials drops vienna 100-150 gr nr 21 natural vienna is now discontinued - see alternative yarn drops melody 1 drops 6 mm / us j crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge **pattern links** swedish version 2 1 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/garnstudio-drops-melody 2 http //garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=88&d_id=16&lang=se
